author: USA TODAY, Michael James, USA TODAY
title: U.S. passes Italy, China as nation with the most confirmed cases of COVID-19
description: The U.S. surged past China and Italy to become the planet's most infected nation Thursday, a stark milestone in the coronavirus era - and a reminder of its deadly, culture-changing effects on American life.
content:
The U.S. surged past China and Italy to become the planet's most infected nation Thursday, a stark milestone in the coronavirus era - and a reminder of its deadly, culture-changing effects on American life.
